Went back and played the game to completion including getting all the achievements, and damn I forgot how good this game is....from the dialogue to the puzzles themselves, fantastic! Definitely a recommend for me
One of the most essential game series to play on Steam along with Half-Life.
Amazing game always a joy, masterpiece of a title.
this game sucks so much do not buy it it is such a waste of money!
this game is great just watch out for level 18 it is very difficult
The greatest Puzzle game ever created!
Solo por la canción del final ya hace que merezca la pena comprar este juego

i absolutely love this game. Its amazing. But i do recommend playing half-life 1 and 2 (including all of the expansion packs along with it because it will make a lot more sense. just saying. i just think its a good idea to play all of valves games in general. they are all geniuses :3.

I got the game after watching YouTube playthroughs, because I wanted to see if I could do it myself.
It turns out I actually can, but it's not easy - there's a couple of times I got so stuck I had to refer back to the walkthrough.
But solving the puzzles on your own really feels good, especially if you find a new/quicker way to do it.

Not recommended for those who are easily triggered or expect an easy solve - this is for people who enjoy problem-solving.
My head hurts. I don't have enough IQ for this. 10/10 would recommend.
Игра отпад!!! Прошел ее за 4 ч. Уверен 2 часть будет улет, поскорей бы скачалась !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Loved it everything was creative unique and fun to do.
Very immersive and challenging game. Even after 12 years it's still amazing.
Great game! Portal 2 is better in my opinion, but it was fun to 100% this game too!
If you find all radios, you're hacking.

A very adictive game , very hard but you need tacticts
Muy buen juego. Te hace pensar mucho con puzzles complejos pero tiene partes de comedia y divierte mucho

很棒的解密冒险游戏，剧情配乐都属于上乘之作。流程有一些短，建议1，2连玩。佩服valve的想象力，即使到现在市面上也很难找到一款能与之媲美的冒险解谜游戏。
Chaos的专业评分：9（风格独特+传世经典）
я слишком тупой для этой игры
It's a classic. Finished the main story in 3 hours and had a lot of fun.

Baldi! Baldi!

We party in the elevator

É simplesmente um ótimo jogo, embora já seja um pouco velho, não está de forma alguma ultrapassado, a história continua sendo maravilhosa e os gráficos embora um pouquinho mais datados, não estão feios.

Uma obra prima da Valve!

Боже, сколько же воспоминаний на меня нахлынуло, пока я перепроходил ее. Приятный геймплей, ну а шутки от робота заслуживают отдельного разговора. Он не выглядит живим, но эти попытки подражать, это забавно. Игра однозначно годная, но короткая
The first game of the Portal series, which is an excellent Puzzle game. Some portions can be difficult but the game is very nice,  I liked the last part.
Krótka gra, ale fajna z ciekawą fabułą

Ну эта просто щедевр своим юмором (правда локализация немного всё испортила в некоторых местах), использованию механик (ну просто 10/10), головоломками с использованию всех механик и, ну здесь это будет сполером, короче игра также легендарна, как и Half-Life, однозначно рекомендую!

This game is amazing, great story, especially when matched with Portal 2 and the game play was also really entertaining. Would recommend this to anyone who wants to play a game as if they were a movie, and challenge themselves with fun puzzles along the way.
